column1: Kata Robata////"You get what you pay for" most definitely applies to this restaurant. Kata Robata isn't a cheap sushi place where you'll be served complimentary anything... but what you will get is great service
column2: and some of the freshest tasting sashimi and award winning food you will have ever tasted. With that said
column3: you should come to Kata Robata with an empty stomach and more importantly
